detail.subject: [Dyson] Business Analyst
description:
At Dyson, we demand the highest
standard of performance from the technologies we engineer. Our people expect
the same from the technology that supports them. We are a community that
appreciates and advocates better engineering?a community of pioneers.  We aim to create a robust IT architecture, manage
data effectively and efficiently, and continue growing our world-class team. A
team that is strategic and enables business acceleration, growth, and success.

Reporting to: Senior / Lead Business
  Analyst

The Role ? BA for a Regional
Business Transformation

Dyson`s global and regional IT
applications teams have accountability for designing and delivering the
business applications, enabling a regional business transformation. You`
ll join a BA team working in the

. It`s a great place to work as we
deliver a wide range of enhancements, projects and programmes across our web,
eCommerce and CRM platforms for our global markets. We develop an approach
unique to the needs of each type of work, using both waterfall and agile
delivery methods. You will work with a wide range of stakeholders in the market
and across the globe to elicit, analyse and document high-quality requirements,
ensuring traceability and management of these requirements throughout the
project lifecycle.

Supporting analysis
activity to elicit requirements and inform business decisions.

Facilitating
Requirements workshop with the UK`s BA team and working closely with the in-market
stakeholders to analyse requirements.

Supporting the
implementation of the information system and enhancements in line with business
need and aiding benefits realisation.

Investigating,
analysing and reviewing a project or business documentation.

Supporting the
definition of requirements for improving processes and systems.

Supporting the
creation of User stories and acceptance criteria in preparation for the
deployment of information and communication systems.

Working
independently or collaboratively on complex situations and tasks.

Providing specialist
advice on the subject to multiple stakeholders on complex issues.

Experience in working across all
stages of large-scale projects and programmes

with demonstrable experience working in
agile delivery teams, demonstrating agile modelling and documentation
techniques.

Excellent communicator with strong
verbal and written communication skills (English and Regional Language

Awareness of the wide
range of activities performed by BAs

Can achieve excellent
results on small, less complicated work without supervision.

Working Knowledge of Ecommerce
(Hybris / AEM) or any  CRM applications (
Sap CRM  Salesforce) would be
advantageous

Experience working in
Retail/ Omnichannel experience

Experience
implementing and supporting large scale implementation programs

Any Business Analysis
professional qualifications would be beneficial

Experience
in the delivery of enhancements to eCommerce and/ or CRM platforms

Experience
in producing and delivering training to business users
